TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputButton extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class HtmlInputButton Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 、 和 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML , , and elements on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來建立網頁上的按鈕控制項。Use the class to create button controls on a Web page. `` HTML 項目是使用任何預設行為時按下按鈕。An `` HTML element is a push button with no default behavior when clicked. `` HTML 項目是送出表單時按下的按鈕。An `` HTML element is a button that submits a form when clicked. `` HTML 按鈕將所有控制項重都設為按一下時其初始值。An `` HTML button resets all controls to their initial values when clicked. 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中，使用類別和分別建立重設和送出按鈕的類別。In ASP.NET 2.0, use the class and the class to create Reset and Submit buttons, respectively. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來建立命令按鈕、 提交按鈕及重設按鈕。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a command button, a Submit button, and a Reset button. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton/cs/htmlinputbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton/vb/htmlinputbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的按鈕類型，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified button type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`type` 參數的值。The value of the `type` parameter.| 下表顯示不同的可能值為`type`參數。The following table shows the different possible values for the `type` parameter. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`button`|命令按鈕。A command button.| |`submit`|按鈕所提交表單至伺服器。A button that submits the form to the server.| |`reset`|清除表單按鈕。A button that clears the form.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體控制使用多載建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control using the overloaded constructor. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonCtor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonCtor2/CS/htmlinputbuttonctor2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonCtor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonCtor2/VB/htmlinputbuttonctor2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出按一下 控制項時，是否執行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果按一下 控制項時會執行驗證，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 頁面驗證會判斷是否與驗證頁面上的控制項通過所有驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯輸入的控制項。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 您可以指定，或決定是否要在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時藉由按下控制項屬性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要避免執行驗證，將屬性`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 這個屬性通常用於事件處理常式以防止頁面驗證時按一下 [取消] 或重設按鈕時所發生的事件。This property is commonly used in the event handler for the event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以防止發生頁面驗證的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 請注意如何方法獨立啟動每個驗證控制項。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation/CS/htmlinputbuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation/VB/htmlinputbuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法覆寫方法。The method overrides the method. 主要由控制項開發人員使用。 is used primarily by control developers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，使它永遠都會顯示自訂粗體文字控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always displays a custom control with bold text. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputbutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputbutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputbutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputbutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 這允許您直接處理事件。

span.span: This allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when an control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 重設按鈕不會引發事件。A Reset button does not raise the event. 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 此事件處理常式加入頁面上的兩個文字方塊的值，並顯示結果。The event handler adds the values of the two text boxes on the page and displays the results. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/CS/htmlinputbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/VB/htmlinputbuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/CS/htmlinputbuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/VB/htmlinputbuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

protected: virtual void RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ eventArgument);

summary.span: 回傳至伺服器時，便會引發 控制項的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由控制項，它按一下時，引發事件。The method is used by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event. 如果屬性是`true`、中指定的控制項群組的呼叫方法屬性。If the property is `true`, the method is called using the group of controls specified in the property. 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充的功能使用控制項。This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底.method。The method overrides the base .method. 主要由控制項開發人員使用。 is used primarily by control developers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便為工具提示，可存取的特定標題文字一律會顯示為。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific title text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributes.vb#2)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下 Web 網頁上的 控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when an control is clicked on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會引發這個事件時按一下控制項時。This event is raised when an control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 重設按鈕不會引發事件。A Reset button does not raise the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 此事件處理常式加入頁面上的兩個文字方塊的值，並顯示結果。The event handler adds the values of the two text boxes on the page and displays the results. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/CS/htmlinputbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/VB/htmlinputbuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/CS/htmlinputbuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/VB/htmlinputbuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定這個屬性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以在頁面上的其他驗證群組從獨立進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此屬性沒有作用時，才值屬性設定為`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員驗證控制項的驗證時控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定此屬性的值和屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上驗證群組未指派。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要驗證時的控制項控制項回傳至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 此頁面包含從使用者擷取資料的兩個文字方塊和兩個控制項，以確保該使用者不會讓文字方塊空白。The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制項中的第一個文字方塊是`CityInfoGroup`驗證群組和控制項中的第二個方塊是`StateInfoGroup`驗證群組。The control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group. 當`CityQueryButton`按一下時，控制項在`CityInfoGroup`驗證群組驗證。When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated. 當`StateQueryButton`按一下時，控制項在`StateInfoGroup`驗證群組驗證。When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup/CS/htmlinputbuttonvalidationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup/VB/htmlinputbuttonvalidationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
